org.grouplens.lenskit.indexes

Class IdIndexMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.indexes.IdIndexMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableIdIndexMapping

    public abstract class IdIndexMapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Bidirectional mapping between long IDs and consecutive, 0-based integer indexes. This makes it easier to store information about sparse IDs (e.g. user or item IDs) in dense, indexed data structures such as arrays, matrices, or lists.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(long id)
        Get the index of an ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to query.
        Returns:
        The ID's index or a negative value if the ID does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is not in the index.

      • containsId

        public boolean containsId(long id)
        Query whether this index contains a particular ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to look for.
        Returns:
        true if the index contains the ID.

      • tryGetIndex

        public abstract int tryGetIndex(long id)
        Try to get the index for an ID, returning a negative value if it does not exist. This method is like getIndex(long), except it returns a negative value instead of throwing an exception if the id does not exist.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to look for.
        Returns:
        The index of the ID, or a negative value if it is not in the index.

      • getId

        public abstract long getId(int idx)
        Get the ID for an index.
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the ID to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The ID for the given idx.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if idx is not a valid index.

      • size

        public abstract int size()
        Get the size of this index.
        Returns:
        The number of indexed IDs.

      • getIdList

        public abstract LongList getIdList()
        Get the list of indexed IDs.
        Returns:
        The list of IDs in the index. No ID will appear twice.

      • create

        public static IdIndexMapping create(java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.Long> ids)
